website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for the wide selection of colors and high pigmentation but not the most comfortable long-wearing lipstick on our list.
pros: Highly pigmented matte liquid lipstick in a range of interesting colors, including trendy shades like teal, indigo, and greige
Plenty of nudes that flatter every skin tone and classic reds and pinks as well
Free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates
cons: Flakes off the lips after several hours of wear

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than pic
customer_reviews.text: Not as dark as it looks in the pictures. Is way closer to an almost nude with a slight tint.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pouncey

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this anastasia liquid lipstick before directly on anastasia web site and the quality is different. This was more dry than the others. Wouldn’t buy here again.
customer_reviews.author: Moraima

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was much more brown than expected and as Sikh as I put it on it started cracking on my lips and looked like my lipstick had been apart of an earthquake. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaila m.

customer_reviews.title: Very drying
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, but it is very drying to your lips. It also has a bad taste. I won't be repurchasing based on the drying factor.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is expensive in Sephora, but let me tell you!!! The price I paid from Amazon saved me more than a few dollars had I brought this from Sephora... classy and sexy!! Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Bodajah Smith

customer_reviews.title: WE WERE VERY DISAPPOINTED!! 😞
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed, I bought two - one for my daughter and the other for myself. The color looks beautiful, but you when you put it on - IT LOOKS AND FEELS VERY, VERY DRY......VERY UNHAPPY ☹️ AND WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: yvonne miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Picture makes it look like a pink shade but it's more of a nude. Not at all the shade I was expecting. It does dry to a lightweight color that lasts for a long time, it's quite difficult to get off!
customer_reviews.author: sara farrior

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite color! Can’t always find it at Ulta as it sells pretty quickly, it’s good to know I can hop on here when I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in my basic make_up essentials. I love this brand, and just purchased the American Doll (red). It is also fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping time was as expected. Color is as expected. Love the color. Will order this brand from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: traci

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The liquid lipstick is long lasting. It feels a bit dry but the colour sticks.
customer_reviews.author: LaviRiyadh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this color. Definitely what I expected. Very flattering color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. Each color stays on so well. Please keep it on the market forever!! Is there a #1 perfume I'm wondering?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my type.
customer_reviews.text: The color was too light and I didn’t like the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not the shade as it supposed to be and very sticky on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills - Liquid Lipstick - Crush
product_meta.description: Color:CrushAnastasia Beverly Hills Liquid Lipstick is a full-pigment liquid lip color formula that dries down to a weightless matte finish for smudge-proof wearability and long-lasting color.
feature_bullets: A full-pigment liquid formula that dries down to a weightless matte finish for smudge-proof wearability.
Features a double-sided flat applicator with a rounded tip that distributes the perfect amount of product for precise application
The long-wearing shades are versatile enough for customization, so you can mix and match multiple shades without losing pigment

Anastasia Beverly Hills ensures that all products sold by ‘Anastasia Beverly Hills Inc.’ on Amazon are authentic and meet our high-ingredient and quality standards. Unfortunately, we cannot guarantee the authenticity of products purchased on Amazon from other third-party sellers.
